data.title: This Perfect Day
data.meta_description: Fawcett Publications, 1970. 1st printing. Paperback. 12mo. Very good+. Item #76545 Spine square and uncreased. Binding tight. Faint chipping at ends. Minor rubbing across covers. 320. Pages unmarked. Orange painted text block slightly faded around edges with remainder mark on top.
